value:
This is a good castle—simple,
solid, defendable. I hope the same
can be said of your country.

I am an inexperienced leader. But I
cannot betray my people's needs
and expectations.

I'm grateful to you for all you've
done. Is there something I can help
you with?

I visited the town nearby, and it was
filled with smiling faces. The people
of this kingdom must be protected.

How heavy is my armor? Not nearly
so heavy as my crown.

I am Sheena. I come with greetings
on behalf of your good friend
$Nf.

Ever forward, and with ever
greater power!

I will better myself one step
at a time.

This step is not worthy of
being called progress.

My power grows yet greater.
It's hard to believe.

I am Princess Sheena of Gra. I
reluctantly assumed the throne after
my father, King Jiol, passed away.

I have heard that you are not
originally from this world.$k$pSo why is it that you continue
to fight for it?$k$pIs it simply that you value the
friends you have made here and
do not wish to abandon them?$k$pIf so...I can understand your
feelings. I, too, cannot abandon
those who need my help...$k$pAs such, I will not leave you here.
As long as you remain, I promise
to support you as well.
むんっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
My armor...
I am no mere princess.
You will fall!
For the people!
I will never give up!
Forgive me.
Hmm...
Did you have something to discuss?
I never know when to be princess and when to be warrior.
I'm not sure if I can lead a kingdom, but I will fight for you.
This armor is the pride of my homeland.
I have often been called...stubborn.
I wonder how my people fare without me...
I will continue to put my trust in you.
Understood.
Command me.
Agreed.
